trans-unit.source: Inserted into a Web page as a placeholder when the attempt to load or create a new instance of a dynamic <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control has failed.
trans-unit.target: Se inserta en una página web como un marcador de posición si hubo un error al intentar cargar o crear una nueva instancia de un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> dinámico.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> class is used by the Web Parts control set as a placeholder for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that could not be added to the page.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> clase se utiliza el control de elementos Web establecido como un marcador de posición para un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control que no se pudo agregar a la página.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control attempts to load or create a new instance of a dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone, and the attempt fails for some reason, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart%2A> method, and inserts an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control in place of the control that failed.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control intenta cargar o crear una nueva instancia de una dinámica <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control en una zona y se produce un error de intento por algún motivo, el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> , a continuación, llama a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart%2A> método e inserta un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control en lugar del control que no se pudo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control is inserted to preserve previously existing personalization state information that might have existed on a control for users.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control se inserta para conservar previas personalización información de estado que podría haber existido en un control para los usuarios.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose there is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that has a personalizable property, so that users can save their own ZIP Code, and then the control can automatically display weather information for that ZIP Code each time the user visits the page.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, suponga que hay un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control que tiene una propiedad personalizable, para que los usuarios puedan guardar su propio código postal y, a continuación, el control puede mostrar automáticamente información meteorológica para ese código postal cada vez que el usuario visita la página.

trans-unit.source: If at some point a problem occurs with the weather control so that it cannot be loaded during a specific request, and yet the rest of the page does load successfully, the custom personalization data that a user has saved for that control would be lost the next time the personalization data for the page is saved.
trans-unit.target: Si en algún momento se produce un problema con el control de tiempo para que no se puede cargar durante una solicitud concreta y aún el resto de la página se carga correctamente, los datos de personalización que un usuario ha guardado para que control se perderían la próxima vez que se guardan los datos de personalización de la página.

trans-unit.source: By inserting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control in place of the failed control, you can notify the user that a problem has occurred, and also provide a mechanism for the Web Parts control set to preserve the user's personalization data on the failed control until the problem can be corrected.
trans-unit.target: Insertando el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control en lugar del control errores, puede notificar al usuario que se ha producido un problema y también proporcionan un mecanismo para el control de elementos Web que se establece para conservar los datos de personalización del usuario en el control errores hasta que se puede solucionar el problema.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> class derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> class, as one of several types designed to be temporary placeholders for other types.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> clase se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> de clase, como uno de varios tipos diseñados para ser marcadores de posición temporales para otros tipos.

trans-unit.source: To create an instance of the class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses its public <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para crear una instancia de la clase, el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control usa su público <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

trans-unit.source: The constructor requires several details of the failed control to be passed to it, such as the ID, the original type of the control (if the failed control is a server or user control wrapped in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object), the original path to the source file for the control (if the failed control is a user control), and the ID of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object if present.
trans-unit.target: El constructor requiere varios detalles del control errores que se pasan a él, tales como el identificador, el tipo original del control (si el control errores es un servidor o control de usuario se ajusta en un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> objeto), la ruta de acceso original del archivo de código fuente para el control (si el control errores es un control de usuario) y el identificador de un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> objeto si está presente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> class has a single public property called <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> clase tiene una propiedad pública única denominada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Developers can assign a value to this property that will be displayed in a Web page when the control is inserted.
trans-unit.target: Los desarrolladores pueden asignar un valor a esta propiedad que se mostrará en una página Web cuando se inserta el control.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> class has three protected methods.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> clase tiene tres métodos protegidos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.AddAttributesToRender%2A> method takes style characteristics from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.ErrorStyle%2A> object for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> zone that contains the control that failed to load.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.AddAttributesToRender%2A> método toma las características de estilo de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.ErrorStyle%2A> de objeto para el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> zona que contiene el control que no se pudo cargar.

trans-unit.source: If any style settings exist in this object, the method applies them to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Si existe cualquier configuración de estilo de este objeto, el método aplica a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization%2A> method sets several important inherited properties on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control, to prevent users from personalizing the control by hiding, minimizing, editing, or exporting it, or changing its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization%2A> método establece varias propiedades heredadas importantes en el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control, para impedir que los usuarios personalizar el control de ocultar, minimizar, editar, o exportarlo, o cambiando su <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A> valor.

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.RenderContents%2A> method encodes the value of the string in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A> property, to prevent rendering problems or scripting attacks.
trans-unit.target: Por último, el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.RenderContents%2A> método codifica el valor de la cadena en el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A> propiedad, para evitar problemas de representación o ataques mediante scripting.

trans-unit.source: The conditions in which an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control is actually inserted into a page are relatively rare, and although the class can be inherited from and extended, few developers will find this to be of great importance.
trans-unit.target: Las condiciones en que un <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control realmente se inserta en una página son relativamente poco frecuentes y, aunque la clase se puede heredar y extender, pocos desarrolladores encontrarán este valor es de gran importancia.

trans-unit.source: One reason you might want to extend this class is if you want to customize the appearance and behavior of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Una razón desea ampliar esta clase es si desea personalizar la apariencia y el comportamiento de la <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control.

trans-unit.source: For example, you could override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization" /> method, and set additional style or other properties on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control, beyond those that are already set.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, podría reemplazar el <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization" /> método y establecer estilo adicionales u otras propiedades en el <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control más allá de aquellas que ya están establecidos.

trans-unit.source: To require the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control to use a custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control, you must also inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> class and override its <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Para requerir la <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control para utilizar un personalizado <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> (control), también debe heredar de la <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> clase e invalidar sus <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: In that method, you should assign the value of the method's <paramref name="errorMessage" /> parameter to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> property of your custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control, because the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control calls this method from several other places, and often passes in a different error message value.
trans-unit.target: En ese método, debe asignar el valor por el método <paramref name="errorMessage" /> parámetro a la <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> propiedad de personalizado <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> controlar, ya que el <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control llama a este método desde varios otros lugares y a menudo se pasa en un valor de mensaje de error diferentes.

trans-unit.source: A string that is the control ID (not the unique ID) of the failing control.
trans-unit.target: Una cadena que es el id. de control (no el id. único) del control que presenta el error.

trans-unit.source: If a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> control is involved in the failure, the ID is the ID of its child server control.
trans-unit.target: Si un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> está relacionado con el error, el id. será el id. de su control de servidor secundario.

trans-unit.source: A string that is the name of the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the failed control.
trans-unit.target: Cadena que es el nombre <see cref="T:System.Type" /> del control que presentó el error.

trans-unit.source: If a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> control is involved in the failure, the type name is the type of its child server control.
trans-unit.target: Si un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> está relacionado con el error, el nombre de tipo será el tipo de su control de servidor secundario.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path to a user control, if a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> control that contains a child user control is involved in the failure.
trans-unit.target: Cadena que contiene la ruta de acceso a un control de usuario, si un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> que contiene un control de usuario secundario está relacionado con el error.

trans-unit.source: A string that returns the ID of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> control, if that type of control was involved in the failure to load or create a control.
trans-unit.target: Cadena que devuelve el id. de un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" />, si ese tipo de control estuviera relacionado con el error al cargar o crear un control.

trans-unit.source: This is needed for controls that do not inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> base class.
trans-unit.target: Esto resulta necesario para los controles que no heredan de la clase base <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the control.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia del control.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control when it fails in an attempt to load or create an instance of a dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control crea una nueva instancia de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> controlar cuando se produce un error en un intento para cargar o crear una instancia de una dinámica <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.

trans-unit.source: Dynamic controls are controls that are added to a page programmatically, or by a user who adds the control from a catalog of controls, as opposed to static controls that are declared in the markup of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Los controles dinámicos son controles que se agregan a una página mediante programación o por un usuario que agrega el control de un catálogo de controles, en oposición a controles estáticos que se declaran en el marcado de una página Web.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.%23ctor%2A> method simply creates an instance of the base class, passing to it the four parameters that contain information about the failed control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.%23ctor%2A> método simplemente crea una instancia de la clase base, pasándole los cuatro parámetros que contienen información sobre el control errores.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that contains the HTML output to be rendered.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> que contiene el resultado HTML que se va a representar.

trans-unit.source: Applies special error style attributes to an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> object that is inserted into a page in place of another control.
trans-unit.target: Aplica atributos de estilo de error especiales a un objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> que se inserta en una página en lugar de otro control.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.AddAttributesToRender%2A> method takes the style characteristics (if any) that are defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.ErrorStyle%2A> object for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> zone that contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.AddAttributesToRender%2A> método toma las características de estilo (si existe) que se definen en el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.ErrorStyle%2A> de objeto para el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> zona que contiene un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control.

trans-unit.source: The styles are applied to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control prior to rendering.
trans-unit.target: Los estilos se aplican a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control antes de representarlo.

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden in a derived <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> class, if developers want to customize the style characteristics that are applied to an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Este método puede reemplazarse en un derivada <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> de la clase, si desean que los desarrolladores personalizar las características de estilo que se aplican a un <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control.

trans-unit.source: To require the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control to use a custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control, you must also inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> class and override its <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Para requerir la <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control para utilizar un personalizado <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> (control), también debe heredar de la <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> clase e invalidar sus <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: In that method, you should assign the value of the method's <paramref name="errorMessage" /> parameter to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> property of your custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control, because the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control calls this method from several other places, and usually passes in a specific error message.
trans-unit.target: En ese método, debe asignar el valor por el método <paramref name="errorMessage" /> parámetro a la <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> propiedad de personalizado <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> controlar, ya que el <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control llama a este método desde varios otros lugares y normalmente se pasa en un mensaje de error específico.

trans-unit.source: Sets several important properties on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control prior to rendering, to prevent users from being able to personalize the control.
trans-unit.target: Establece varias propiedades importantes en el control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> antes de la representación, para evitar que los usuarios puedan personalizar el control.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization%2A> method sets properties on an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control before it is rendered.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization%2A> método establece las propiedades de un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control antes de representarlo.

trans-unit.source: These properties prevent users from hiding, minimizing, editing, or exporting the control, or changing its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Estas propiedades impiden a los usuarios ocultar, minimizar, editar, o exportar el control o cambiar su <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A> valor.

trans-unit.source: However, users can close or delete an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control instance.
trans-unit.target: Sin embargo, los usuarios pueden cerrar o eliminar una <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> instancia del control.

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden in an inherited <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Este método puede reemplazarse en heredadas <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control.

trans-unit.source: Developers might want to override the method to set additional properties on the control, such as a default <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> property value.
trans-unit.target: Los desarrolladores que desee invalidar el método para establecer propiedades adicionales en el control, como el valor predeterminado es <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> valor de propiedad.

trans-unit.source: To require the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control to use a custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control, you must also inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> class and override its <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Para requerir la <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control para utilizar un personalizado <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> (control), también debe heredar de la <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> clase e invalidar sus <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: In that method, you should assign the value of the method's <paramref name="errorMessage" /> parameter to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> property of your custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control, because the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control calls this method from several other places, and usually passes in a specific error message.
trans-unit.target: En ese método, debe asignar el valor por el método <paramref name="errorMessage" /> parámetro a la <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> propiedad de personalizado <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> controlar, ya que el <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control llama a este método desde varios otros lugares y normalmente se pasa en un mensaje de error específico.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message that is displayed in a Web page in place of a control that could not be successfully added to the page.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el mensaje de error que se muestra en una página Web en lugar de un control que no se pudo agregar correctamente a la página.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the text of the error message.
trans-unit.target: Una cadena que contiene el texto del mensaje de error.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a culture-specific error message.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es un mensaje de error específico de la referencia cultural.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A> property can be assigned a value by a developer, so that a custom error message is displayed at the point where the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control is inserted into a page.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A> propiedad se puede asignar un valor por un desarrollador para que se muestre un mensaje de error personalizado en el punto donde el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control se inserta en una página.

trans-unit.source: Developers can assign a default value to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> property by extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> class and, in the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> constructor or in an overridden <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization" /> method, assigning a default value to the property.
trans-unit.target: Los desarrolladores pueden asignar un valor predeterminado para la <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> propiedad extendiendo el <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> clase y, en la <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> constructor o en un invalidado <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization" /> método, asignar un valor predeterminado a la propiedad.

trans-unit.source: To require the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control to use a custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control, you must also inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> class and override its <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Para requerir la <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control para utilizar un personalizado <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> (control), también debe heredar de la <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> clase e invalidar sus <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: In that method, you should assign the value of the method's <paramref name="errorMessage" /> parameter to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> property of your custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control, because the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control calls this method from several other places, and usually passes in a specific error message.
trans-unit.target: En ese método, debe asignar el valor por el método <paramref name="errorMessage" /> parámetro a la <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> propiedad de personalizado <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> controlar, ya que el <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control llama a este método desde varios otros lugares y normalmente se pasa en un mensaje de error específico.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that encodes the error message.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> que codifica el mensaje de error.

trans-unit.source: Encodes the string value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Codifica el valor de cadena de la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.RenderContents%2A> method encodes the string assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A> property to ensure that it renders properly, and to protect against script injection attacks.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.RenderContents%2A> método codifica la cadena asignada a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A> propiedad para asegurarse de que representa correctamente y para protegerse frente a ataques de inyección de script.

trans-unit.source: This method is added only to implement the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: Este método sólo se agrega para implementar la interfaz <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is added only to implement the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: Este método sólo se agrega para implementar la interfaz <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable" />.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable" /> interface and calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementa la interfaz <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable" /> y llama al método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is added only to implement the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: Este método sólo se agrega para implementar la interfaz <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control tracks the status of its changes.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si el control sigue la traza del estado de sus cambios.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the Web Parts control is responsible for determining when the control is considered changed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si el control de elementos web es responsable de determinar cuándo se considera que el control ha cambiado; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.
